name: WCAG Tokens
title: Accessibility Design Tokens
description: A collection of design tokens aimed at enhancing accessibility compliance according to WCAG guidelines.
author: Marcelo Paiva

wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Tokens to ensure content can be presented without loss of information or functionality, and without requiring scrolling in two dimensions for: Vertical scrolling content at a width equivalent to 320 CSS pixels; Horizontal scrolling content at a height equivalent to 256 CSS pixels.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: By providing tokens for defining maximum width, minimum height, responsive breakpoints, and media queries, content can reflow effectively to accommodate different viewport sizes, meeting the WCAG guidelines for accessibility.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Apply this token to set the maximum width of content containers to ensure they do not exceed 320 CSS pixels for vertical scrolling content.
Use this token to specify the minimum height of content containers to meet the height equivalent to 256 CSS pixels for horizontal scrolling content.
Define responsive breakpoints for different viewport sizes to ensure content reflows appropriately.

tokens.tokenValue: @media screen and (min-width: 768px) { /* Custom CSS rules for larger viewports */ }
tokens.tokenInstructions: Use this token to specify custom media queries for layout adjustments based on viewport dimensions.

wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Design tokens to control text spacing according to WCAG 1.4.12 to improve readability for users with dyslexia or other reading disabilities.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: Allows users to adjust text spacing properties to improve readability without losing content or functionality, fostering greater accessibility.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Apply this multiplier to the font size for setting line height.
Apply this multiplier to the font size for setting spacing after paragraphs.
Apply this multiplier to the font size for setting letter spacing.
Apply this multiplier to the font size for setting word spacing.
Use this scalar to adjust all spacing values simultaneously as needed.

wcagTokens.title: Accessibility Design Tokens
wcagTokens.description: A collection of design tokens aimed at enhancing accessibility compliance according to WCAG guidelines.
wcagTokens.author: Marcelo Paiva

wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Design tokens that specify minimum contrast ratios for text to ensure readability and compliance with WCAG 1.4.3.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: Improves readability for users with visual impairments by ensuring text stands out against its background.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Ensure that text and images of text have at least a 4.5:1 contrast ratio against their background.
Ensure that large text (18pt and above, or 14pt and bold) has at least a 3:1 contrast ratio against its background.

wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Design tokens to specify enhanced contrast ratios for text, exceeding the minimum WCAG requirements, to aid users with low vision.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: Provides higher contrast ratios for text, significantly improving readability for users with visual impairments.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Ensure that text (below large text thresholds) achieves at least a 7:1 contrast ratio against its background.
Ensure that large text achieves at least a 4.5:1 contrast ratio against its background.

wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Design tokens that facilitate text resizing up to 200%, ensuring readability and usability for users with visual impairments as stipulated by WCAG 1.4.4.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: Enables text to be scaled without loss of content or functionality, enhancing accessibility for users requiring larger text sizes.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Set this as the base font size from which scaling is applied.
Apply this factor to the base font size to increase text up to 200% without loss of functionality.
This is the maximum text size achievable through scaling, ensuring content remains functional at increased sizes.

wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Design tokens to enhance the visual presentation of text by managing width, alignment, spacing, and direction, as stipulated by WCAG 1.4.8.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: Improves readability and clarity of text, particularly for users with visual or cognitive disabilities, by standardizing critical aspects of text layout.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Apply this maximum width to text blocks to ensure they do not exceed 80 characters or glyphs.
Set text alignment to left to avoid full justification and improve readability.
Use this spacing multiplier within paragraphs to maintain at least space-and-a-half line spacing.
Apply this spacing multiplier between paragraphs, set at least 1.5 times the line spacing.
Set text direction as left-to-right or right-to-left depending on the language and cultural context.

wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Design tokens that facilitate the creation of user-adjustable timing settings for apps, helping comply with WCAG 2.2.1 and enhancing user accessibility.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: Allows users to customize timing settings to suit their needs, ensuring a more accessible and personalized interaction.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Set this as the default time limit for timed interactions, adjustable via app settings.
Provides a range of time limits that users can choose from in app settings to adjust their experience.
When enabled in settings, this allows automatic extensions of time limits for tasks.
Ensures that user-defined time settings are saved and applied in future sessions.

wcagTokens.tokenSetName: User Control Settings for Dynamic Content
wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Design tokens that enable users to customize their preferences for managing animations, autoplay content, visibility of dynamic elements, and update frequencies, complying with WCAG 2.2.2.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: Empowers users to adjust their interaction with dynamic content to reduce distractions, manage sensory inputs, and improve usability, ensuring accessibility for individuals with various disabilities.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Users can select 'none', 'reduce', or 'eliminate' to control motion intensity across the platform.
Users can set this to 'on' or 'off' to control the automatic playing of videos and animations.
Users can choose to 'show' or 'hide' non-essential dynamic content to reduce distractions.
Users can adjust the update frequency to 'low', 'normal', or 'high', based on their preference for how dynamic the content should be.

wcagTokens.tokenSetDescription: Design tokens to enhance the visibility of keyboard focus indicators, ensuring that keyboard users can clearly identify which element has focus.
wcagTokens.tokenSetBenefit: Enhances usability for keyboard users, particularly those with visual impairments, by providing clear and customizable focus indicators.

tokens.tokenInstructions: Apply this color to the focus indicator to ensure it is visible against a variety of backgrounds.
Use this style for focus indicators to maintain visibility across UI components.
Set the thickness of the focus indicator to this value to enhance visibility without distraction.
Optionally apply this animation to the focus indicator to gently draw attention.
